short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search within a YouTube video and find topics to help you sort through the clutter of a long clip.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Too Long Don't Watch uses AI to allow you to skip right to the interesting parts of a video by giving you a table of contents for the clip. You can click on one of the titled boxes to jump to the part of the video related to that topic, or use the search bar to find a specific piece of dialog.
